patch 8.2.0320: no Haiku support

Problem:    No Haiku support.
Solution:   Add support for Haiku. (Emir Sari, closes #5605)

attachments.text: Problem: No Haiku support. Solution: Add support for Haiku. (Emir Sari, closes #5605)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ad39c094d261109a695aba2c4f19fe336736cc55|patch 8.2.0321: Vim9: ":execute" does not work yet>
patch 8.2.0321: Vim9: ":execute" does not work yet

Problem:    Vim9: ":execute" does not work yet.
Solution:   Add ISN_EXECUTE. (closes #5699) Also make :echo work with more
            than one argument.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0321: Vim9: ":execute" does not work yet · vim/vim@ad39c09
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0321: Vim9: ":execute" does not work yet · vim/vim@ad39c09
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: ":execute" does not work yet. Solution: Add ISN_EXECUTE. (closes #5699) Also make :echo work with more than one argument.

text:

patch 8.2.0322: Vim9: error checks not tested

Problem:    Vim9: error checks not tested.
Solution:   Add more test cases.  Avoid error for function loaded later.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7eeefd4a395fe3d7c7a2a0879467cf7ed4c29fe6|patch 8.2.0323: Vim9: calling a function that is defined later is slow>
patch 8.2.0323: Vim9: calling a function that is defined later is slow

Problem:    Vim9: calling a function that is defined later is slow.
Solution:   Once the function is found update the instruction so it can be
            called directly.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0323: Vim9: calling a function that is defined later is slow · vim/vim@7eeefd4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0323: Vim9: calling a function that is defined later is slow · vim/vim@7eeefd4
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: calling a function that is defined later is slow. Solution: Once the function is found update the instruction so it can be called directly.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/12f20038714928bfecdeee31ed1f927324542034|patch 8.2.0324: text property not updated correctly when inserting/de…>
patch 8.2.0324: text property not updated correctly when inserting/deleting

Problem:    Text property not updated correctly when inserting/deleting.
Solution:   Use the right column when deleting. Make zero-width text
            properties respect start_incl and end_incl. (Axel Forsman,
            closes #5696, closes #5679)
